categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Melikah was a female Human Sith who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the start of the Galactic War. Part of the Sith forces that attacked the Fortitude in 3642 BBY. She fell in battle against the Barsen'thor.

She was a skilled Sith sorcerer, as evidenced by her use of Force Lightning and Force Storm. She was also capable of using a dark side type of force heal. With the exception of Arrax and Tasandra, she was the strongest Sith in the attack.
